body: The Guardian has been awarded four awards at this year’s British Media Awards. The British Media Awards highlight the best in innovation and excellence in the media industry.  The Guardian’s Professional Networks picked up gold for content team of the year. Other wins included a bronze awards for product team of the year and app of the year. Former editor-in-chief Alan Rusbridger was recognised with an outstanding contribution to British Media award. Further information can be found on the British Media Awards site.
webTitle: The Guardian wins three British Media Awards
